titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a study on the recruitment and retention of foster parents in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 5/26/2011--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to study the recruitment and retention of foster parents of children served by any foster care program funded under part E (Foster Care and Adoption Assistance) of title IV of the Social Security Act.
